body.p: This meeting is the only public meeting the board of the Gentoo Foundation is obliged to hold. Normal meeting business is suspended.

li.b: Date of Next Meeting - 15th Sep 2012 19:00 UTC

ul.li: Who will post the log? Minutes?
Who will update the motions page?

body.p: The channel will be open (not moderated) during the meeting unless there is so much chatter it becomes impossible to make progress.
Attendees can help by keeping questions to the end of an agenda item or the end of the meeting - your point may be covered during the discussion anyway.
Do not expect to bring up items in Any Other Business and get an instant response. Calm considered well reasoned emails to the trustees or opening a bug are the best ways to bring up new ideas.
The meeting irc logs will be recorded.
The meeting motions will be logged.
